attributes.title: Dysfunctional
attributes.review: The user interface on this app is not at all friendly. It’s buggy and keeps crashing and I just can’t log on and show support. Maybe it should be removed and fixed so that people can benefit from something that works. The app that is.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS.
attributes.review: I was walking on the side of a road at night when I downloaded this. The app crashed my phone, so I wasn’t able to use it, and suddenly a white van pulled up next to me. Three people jumped out. I tried to call 911, but I couldn't BECAUSE THIS APP RUINED MY PHONE. Turns out, the people who kidnapped me actually work for this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR YOU TOO WILL BE KIDNAPPED AND NEED A NEW PHONE.

attributes.title: it’s a no for me❤️
attributes.review: all i wanted to do is support this cheeto and then all of a sudden the app crashed and shut down my phone and then it melted my brain. I’m very disappointed this app needs to go in the trash before someone else has to experience this i am so very sorry😔 anyways have a magical day everyone✨😘

attributes.title: i am now dead
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to support our aMaZinG president and when i downloaded it i was told it needed my address and credit card info so ofc i did just that. now i am being tracked by an assassin and i’m on the run leaving my 12 1/2 kids and an alcoholic husband at home to fend for themselves 😞

attributes.title: Not so good
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what Don’s plans are for the future of this country. I was highly disappointed in the overall quality of this app. Along with that my phone exploded shortly after opening the app and I have since had to buy a new one. Worst app out there.

attributes.title: Tik tok should stay!
attributes.review: Tik tok is not only a great platform but a amazing app you can have fun on I’m not ready for any platform like this to get deleted just like vine. Tik tok should stay because you can’t delete an app that supposedly you don’t like just because you don’t like the country or state that is unfair Trump. Trump is so racist and homophobic btw hunny 😘🤪😂!

attributes.title: Don’t waste your time downloading it
attributes.review: This app is very ugly I opened it and was greeted with a puff Cheeto I would definitely never do it again it took 5 hours to download and a soon as I put my phone number in I got hacked like 5hours later definetly don’t recommend save your time don’t download horrible app

attributes.title: gonna be a no from me chief
attributes.review: the lay out is trash, it took over my phone, the notifications are endless and have very inappropriate “joke” in nearly every one of them. don’t download just use and online site or also give it one start so Mr. President knows he has a problem here. very unpleasant.

attributes.title: COMPLETE TRASH
attributes.review: Although I love president Cheeto this app is killing America instead of making great again (back when slavery and misogyny at its peak) I opened the app and it literally KILLED ME🤭. And now I’m dead. This app is a murders people. I give it a rating .2/10  but only bc seeing the annoying orange 🍊 right when you open it made me a little nostalgic🤷🏿‍♂️

attributes.title: 🦠🧬!!VIRUS ALERT!!🦠🧪
attributes.review: It downloaded a virus directly on to my phone and I had to get a completely new phone because of it!! The advertisements were vile and quite disturbing! I will NEVER get this app again! I clicked on a link in the app and it immediately took me to a porn site. I was disgusted. I can’t believe this is still legal — Z.
